Jeweler Ellie: Ah, very nice! One, two, three... 10 ore pieces! This should be enough. Now I'll get started! With this Oriharukon and silver, I'll make a very pretty... Oh no! I'm sorry,we've got a problem! I was going to augment the ore so I could make a beautiful piece of jewelry, but I ran out of some materials I need! Will you help me? I can't leave the store, and there's no time to order them now. I need 5 Oriharukons, 500 units of silver and 150 Thons. I know it's a lot, but I've got to have them! Please hurry!
